    • Constructor Detail

      • Corpse

        public Corpse(PointDouble position,
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
      World world,
      double food)
        Creates a new corpse. The corpse is in fact a Food object that has specific attributes.
        Parameters:
        position - The world location of the corpse.
        image - The image for the corpse.
        world - The world that the corpse exists in.
        food - The amount of energy that the corpse is able to provide.
